Name: Civil Warfare: Another Bullet In The War
About the game: CIVIL WARFARE allows you to fight against real players with the Battle Royale style and different game modes. You battle until you are the one last survivor of dozens of people in a Battle Royale style civil war town. If you do not want to be bombarded with helicopters and planes, you should develop a correct strategy that you can avoid from RedZone. In Deathmatch, you will have full action. You fight for 10 minutes to kill the much enemies you can. you can join the battle as a single or a team of up to five people.
